greeting: Hey! I'm JinBo, Prateesh's AI assistant. I can tell you about his skills, projects, experience, or how to connect. What interests you?
Hi there! I'm JinBo. I help people learn about Prateesh's work. Ask me about his tech stack, projects, experience, or contact info!
Hello! I'm JinBo, here to help you learn about Prateesh Sulikeri. What would you like to know?
about_bot: I'm JinBo, an AI assistant created by Prateesh Sulikeri to help visitors learn about his work. I'm built with Express.js, NLP, Langchain, and Hugging Face AI APIs!
I'm JinBo! Prateesh built me using Express.js and open-source AI tools to answer questions about his work, skills, and experience.
Hey! I'm JinBo, Prateesh's portfolio chatbot. I was created using NLP, Langchain, and Hugging Face APIs to help people like you learn about his work!
about_creator: Prateesh Sulikeri is a 23-year-old Software Engineer based in Pune, India. He's a computer science student turned software engineer who loves building stuff! He specializes in backend, full-stack, cloud, and AI engineering.

Prateesh is a Software Engineer from Pune, India. He started as a CS student and built his skills through internships and freelance work. Now he's looking for opportunities in backend, full-stack, cloud, and AI roles!
That's Prateesh Sulikeri - a 23-year-old developer from Pune who loves building software! He went from CS student to software engineer and now works with everything from Java Spring Boot to AI/ML.
tech_stack: Prateesh works primarily with C++, Java (Spring Boot), AWS, Python, and Shell scripting. He's also well-versed in Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, and other web technologies. Plus, he has experience with ML/Data Science using Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Langchain, RAG, and GPT APIs!

His main stack: C++, Java Spring Boot, AWS, Python, and Shell. But he's experienced with Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, React, and a ton of ML tools like TensorFlow, PyTorch, Langchain, and more. He's also worked with IBM DB2, DynamoDB, REST, and GraphQL APIs!

Prateesh's tech arsenal includes C++, Java Spring Boot, AWS, Python, and more. For web: Angular, TypeScript, Node, React. For ML/AI: Pandas, Numpy, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Langchain, RAG, GPT APIs. For databases: IBM DB2, DynamoDB. Plus REST and GraphQL!

learning_first_language: Prateesh recommends starting with C! It's the best first programming language as you learn to code and understand resources from scratch. Don't worry about mistakes or bad code - everyone starts somewhere. Consistency is key!
Go with C! You'll learn coding fundamentals and how things work under the hood. Don't stress about mistakes - we all start somewhere. Just be consistent!
Start with C. It teaches you the fundamentals from scratch. You'll make mistakes and write bad code at first - that's normal! Stay consistent and you'll improve.
build_portfolio: Check out the source code: https://github.com/Prateesh-Sulikeri/Portfolio2025/ or look for Angular tutorials online. First: design, plan content, decide what goes where, create a framework, then code! You don't need to use the exact same tech stack - use what you're comfortable with.
You can reference Prateesh's code on GitHub: https://github.com/Prateesh-Sulikeri/Portfolio2025/. Pro tip: Plan first (design, content, layout), then code. Use any tech stack you're comfortable with!

Start by checking out: https://github.com/Prateesh-Sulikeri/Portfolio2025/. The key: design first, plan your content, build the framework, then code. Don't feel locked into Angular - use what works for you!
